actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Instructs the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the Honorable Thomas S. Foley has been elected Speaker of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker of the House of Representatives.
